title: 'Poor quality'
body: Hi, I bought this product.......... from Amazon on ........... The product's quality is so poor that it has developed multiple scratches on its body just in one trip. So, I need to get it changed or would request for refund of my money as the product quality is very poor & doesn't meet my expectation at all. I never expected such a poor quality product from American tourister being sold on such a big platform like Amazon.

title: 'Very flimsy material'
body: 'We went by the brand and were actually disappointed. We definitely do not expect our luggages to be handled with love and care and hence the material should be able to withstand the rough handling. My suitcase came back to be with a good dent and with the flimsy quality it was not unexpected. I would not recommend this to frequent flight travellers. The product is extremely light weight and good otherwise.'
